sent.orig: Obviously it was a disaster, obviously it had caused property damage, but the people were okay.
sent.trans: 这显然是一场灾难，这显然已经造成了财产损失，但人们都好。

sent.orig: She was obviously feeling great shame about her behavior last night.
sent.trans: 她显然为自己昨天晚上的行为感到很羞愧。

sent.orig: The maximum main stress value of enamel, and dental prosthetic restoration were more than dentine obviously.
sent.trans: 牙釉质、修复体的最大应力值明显大于牙本质的最大应力值。

sent.orig: Obviously I had a bad run out of turn one, Robert had more speed.
sent.trans: 显然我在一号弯跑得并不是最好，库比卡速度更好。

sent.orig: Well, you obviously no interest in saving yourself.
sent.trans: 嗯，你显然是没有兴趣来拯救你自己。
